alert.note: Alert for Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 15 at 1:29AM MST until February 15 at 4:00AM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Periods of snow through 4 am. Generally less than an inch in the downtown area with an inch or a bit more in the outlying areas especially elevations above 2,800 ft. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Tucson Metro Area and Upper Gila River Valley. * WHEN...Until 4 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures dropping to around freezing may make for local icy conditions, especially on area bridges which can freeze up more quickly.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail; Upper Gila River and Aravaipa Valleys including Clifton, Safford
